titles.title: Small Business Access to Savings Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow hardship distributions from 401(k) plans to prevent the insolvency of a trade or business of the employee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/31/2008--Introduced. Small Business Access to Savings Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax-free hardship distribution from a 401k pension plan to prevent the insolvency of a trade or business of the plan participant.
